attributes.action: Exclude Exeter from becoming a Unitary Authority
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Devon already has 2 failing unitary Authorities. The cost implications for Exeter and Devon citizens has not been properly accounted for in the likelihood of increased council tax. The loss in funding for Devon County Council Projects for Exeter will be significantly reduced. Also the services in both authorities could be affected significantly. Local Authority jobs would be affected due to relocation and possible redundancies.
